original_title: Sri Lanka stocks close up, turnover at 1bn
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – The Colombo Stock Exchange closed up on Thursday, CSE data showed.
The All Share Price Index was up 0.37 percent, or 39.35 points, at 10,642.
The S&P SL20 index was up 0.48 percent, or 14.65 points, at 3,059.
Positive contributors to the ASPI were C T Holdings Plc (up at 281.50), Hatton National Bank Plc (flat at 4.60), and John Keells Holdings Plc (up at 190.25).

There was mixed sentiments around Agstar Plc (down at 8.50), Browns Investments Plc (flat at 4.60), and Brown and Company Plc (up at 99.80) after yesterday’s share transfer, which pushed the day’s turnover levels. (Colombo/Dec21/2023).
